H0.text: Charleston is the capital of which US state. South Carolina

H1.text: Charleston is the capital of which US state. North Carolina

H2.text: Charleston is the capital of which US state. Mississippi

H3.text: Charleston is the capital of which US state. WV

A4.text: Charleston () is the capital and most populous city of the U.S. state of West Virginia.

A5.text: After West Virginia separated from Virginia, Charleston became the permanent state capital in 1885.
